entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Cornwall
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:30 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saint-Anicet 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023
Temperature: -5.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 58 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -12.7°C
Wind: ENE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023
